How many files do these 2 imports add to the closure?
Not sure I'm looking at the right thing, but the graph produced by `lake exe graph --to Mathlib.Data.Fin.Tuple.Basic --reduce` went from 560 edges to 644.

I pushed a proof that doesn't use `zify`. I guess, now we need a review from another maintainer.
maintainer merge
Non-closing `simp`s aren't allowed in Mathlib. Please use `simp?` to turn it into `simp only` (or into` simp? [] says ...`).
